Uses of Class
lexa.core.transform.Transform

  • Packages that use Transform 
    Package Description
    lexa.core.transform
    Lexa Transform is used to manipulate the contents of a DataSet.

    • Uses of Transform in lexa.core.transform

      Subclasses of Transform in lexa.core.transform 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Contains
      Extract items from a data set.
      class  Flatten
      Create a transformation to flatten contents
      class  Group
      Grouping functions for a transform
      class  Map
      A transform that applies an ExpressionMap to the input.
      class  TransformStep
      A step in a data set transformation
      class  Truncate
      A transform that truncates the input.
      Fields in lexa.core.transform declared as Transform 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Transform TransformStep.previous
      The previous step in the transformation
      Fields in lexa.core.transform with type parameters of type Transform 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.Set<Transform> Transform.children
      the child transforms
      Methods in lexa.core.transform that return Transform 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Transform Transform.contains(java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object value)
      Create a transformation of contained items; equivalent to new Contains(this, key, value)
      Transform Transform.flatten(java.lang.String key)
      Create a transformation of flattened items; equivalent to new Flatten(this, key)
      Transform Transform.group()
      Create a transformation of grouped items; equivalent to new Group(this)
      Transform Transform.group(lexa.core.data.DataSet grouping)
      Create a transformation of grouped items; equivalent to new Group(this, grouping)
      Transform Transform.map(lexa.core.expression.map.ExpressionMap map)
      Create a transformation of mapped items; equivalent to new Group(this, map)
      Transform Transform.sort(java.lang.String[] field, boolean[] ascending)
      Create a transformation of sorted items; equivalent to new Group(this, field, ascending)
      Transform Transform.sort(java.lang.String field, boolean ascending)
      Create a transformation of sorted items; equivalent to new Group(this, field, ascending)
      Transform Transform.truncate(int requiredSize)
      Create a transformation of truncated items; equivalent to new Group(this, requiredSize)
      Constructors in lexa.core.transform with parameters of type Transform 
      Constructor and Description
      Contains(Transform parent, java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object value)
      Extract the items containing a matching key/value
      Flatten(Transform parent, java.lang.String field)
      Create a transformation to flatten contents
      Group(Transform parent)
      Create a group transform to count the entries.

      Create a group transform
      Map(Transform parent, lexa.core.expression.map.ExpressionMap map)
      Create a group transform
      Truncate(Transform parent, int requiredSize)
      Create a transform to truncate the data.
